not-found-page.title: Page not found

login-page.title: Login form

update.email-q: Are you sure you want to change your email for login?

password.reset-q: Are you sure you want to reset your password?

errors.email: Email {{email}} is taken by other user
errors.not-found: Your profile was deleted from your other session

user-errors.name: Name is required
user-errors.role: At least one role must be set
user-errors.longitude: Longitude must be a number between -180 and 180
user-errors.latitude: Latitude must be a number between -90 and 90
user-errors.coords: Both longitude and latitude must be present

errors.not-found: The user is not found (was deleted previously)
errors.email-dup: There exists user with such email

change.title: Enter new password
change.no-password: Password must be not shorter than 6 characters, have at least a letter, an uppercase letter, a digit and a symbol

register.title: New User Registration
register.login: Please, enter your credentials to log in
